#summary Module "mail"

= <font color="red">*v8cgi is now known as [http://code.google.com/p/teajs/ TeaJS]! Please see the [http://code.google.com/p/teajs/wiki/API_Mail proper version of this page].*</font> =
= Mail module =

Defined in file `mail.js`.

Functions: *mail()*. 

{{{
var to = "target@example.com";
var subject = "test";
var body = "testing the mail!";
var headers = { From: "me@example.com" };
var auth = {
  type: "login",
  user: "test",
  password: "secret"
};

require("mail").mail(to, subject, body, headers, auth);
}}}
